question: Generate a comprehensive report on the technology adoption trends of companies in the healthcare industry over the last three years.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Identify all companies in the healthcare industry and gather their basic information such as name, founding year, and employee count.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":2,"task":"Collect details on the technological focus areas and IT partnerships of the identified healthcare companies to understand their technology adoption trends.","table":["CompanyTechStack","CompanyITPartnerDetail"]},{"step":3,"task":"Analyze the recent contracts and deals in technology services related to these healthcare companies to identify trends in technology investment.","table":["CompanyDealMaster"]},{"step":4,"task":"Summarize the findings into a structured report format, including insights on technology trends, investment focus, and strategic directions for healthcare companies.","table":["SectionData","SectionInfo"]}]}
